ModMetaData.name: I Am Hungry
ModMetaData.author: Trunken
ModMetaData.description: Yummy! Adds a Stove to cook Adds a Fireplace to cook (warm) Adds 8 Recipes with different taste Supports RimCuisine, Gloomy Furniture & Extra Kitchen! Works together with VGP, Rimstro and Thanks For All The Fish! Compatibility: - Rimstro (Cooking Places) - Gloomy Furniture (Cooking Places) - Gloomy Extra Kitchen (Cooking Places) - Thanks For All The Fish (Salmon, Shrimps) - VGP Vegetable Garden (Ingredients Wheat/Flour) - VGP Garden Gourmet - RimCuisine (Ingredients Wheat/Flour) - Real World Food - Dianne's Food - Seeds Please Included Patches are interactive and react to user decisions. Mods will only be combined, when found. Just load I Am Hungry after your other Food Mods to let it do its work.
